Class LoopCanvas

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public abstract class LoopCanvas
extends Canvas
implements java.lang.Runnable

Threaded class for creating a game loop based on Canvas class

Author:
william@rattat.com

abstract  void tick()
